mods.abstract: Portico colonnade, Temple of Seti I at Qurna, West Thebes (New Kingdom Dynasty XIX); eight lotiform capital columns of the portico colonnade at the mortuary Temple of Seti I, at least four Egyptian men stand against columns; rectangle doorway to darkness (left) "Temple de Kournah Photogr. Artistique G. Lekegian & Co." in white along bottom of print. (Number on object is 12/655)

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
